attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mercury, Venus, Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune, Uranus and Pluto all have a 'u' in their name, whereas 'Earth' just sounds like a clod of mud. Earth needs re-branding to bring it into the 21st century, and replacing its 'Ea' with a 'U' is just the way to do it. Wouldn't Urth be a much more sci-fi sort of name for a planet? It's much more exotic, sounds like somewhere you'd want to live.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
